content: sample that i added extra colorwork if you are new to colorwork i do not recommend adding additional colors yet you ll want to be comfortable with basic bobbin techniques and clean color changes before introducing them into interlocking crochet likewise if you ve never done interlocking crochet before i highly recommend making at least one full square using only two colors to get the feel for the technique i have several other patterns using this same method if you d like more practice i won t be breaking down the step-by-step process of color changes in this pattern but i do provide all color counts and placement for the heart in i <3 snow as long as you re comfortable with simple bobbin colorwork you ll be able to follow along if you re new to interlocking crochet i suggest trying the two-color version first to get the technique down colorwork tips 1 change colors with 2 loops left on your last double_crochet draw up the new color when you have two loops remaining on the hook then complete the double_crochet and chain with the new color 2 always keep non-working yarn on the wrong side of your work this helps prevent tangling and keeps the front clean 3 front vs back loops during color transitions occasionally when switching colors in interlocking crochet a small pop of the previous color may peek through this is especially noticeable in the word month in the example to avoid this you can work into front or back loops during transition row as shown in the word seasonal o when working on the front side work the double_crochet into the back loop of the stitch in the row below o when working on the back side work the double_crochet into the front loop of the stitch in the row below this small adjustment keeps your color transitions crisp and prevents unwanted dots of color from appearing page | 3 foundation row color a the color of the linework chain 55 turn row 1 right side double_crochet in 5 chain from hook counts as chain 1 double_crochet chain 1 *chain 1 skip 1 double_crochet in next st* 25 times th chain 4 do not turn 27 double_crochet 26 windows made color b foundation chain chain 53 turn row 2 - foundation row click here for video hold color b chain in front of color a foundation row double_crochet in 5th chain from hook through the back of the second window in the color a foundation row do this by inserting hook through the back of the second window and picking up the chain through the front of the window use the hook to bring chain loop through to the back of the window and work double_crochet like normal complete the stitch through the back of the window *chain 1 skip 1 chain double_crochet through next window* 23 times double_crochet in front of color a foundation row in the last stitch chain 4 turn
